description: longcheer data gathers for Linux on any platform: AMD64, POWER8/9, Raspberry Pi and any Linux versionIncludes 14 graphs of the regular CPU, memory, disks, filesystems and networks plus memory Pie charts and table view of memory extra stats.

targets.query: select floor(mean(idle)) from cpu_total where  ("host" =~ /^$node$/) and time > now() - 10m

panels.description: disk busy rate. the lower the better

targets.query: select max(busy) from disks where ("host" =~ /^$node$/) and time > now() - 10m

panels.title: disk busy rate(%)

targets.query: select last("MemTotal")/1024/1024 as "total", last("Active")/1024/1024 as "active", last("MemFree")/1024/1024 as "free" FROM "proc_meminfo" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter
select sum(total) as retrans from net_retrans where ("host" =~ /^$node$/) and time > now() - 1h
SELECT "l_rx_kern" FROM "pingtrace" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "/^$node$/"
SELECT mean("user") FROM "cpu_total" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: netMonRemote
